name: The Blind Prophet
description: <strong>The Blind Prophet</strong> is a point'n'Click game where you will play apostle Bartholomeus in his divine mission: liberate the corrupted city of Rotbork, and brave the Great Evil that lurks within.<br/>Although he's used to execute his duty, it won't be as easy as it should be this time ... <br/><br/>Inspired from games such as Blade Runner, Broken Sword series or Gabriel Knight, the game builds its foundation on a strong storyline, a sense of fluidity and a darkly pleasing ambiance.<br/>Use your sagacity and intelligence to defeat traps, hunt demons and destroy their diabolical ways. <br/><br/><br/><br/><ul><li>Free exploration in 99 hand-drawed panels, with tiny details waiting for you to discover it<br/></li><li>A strong storyline, but not without humor!<br/></li><li>Unique comic book art-style experience<br/></li><li>Various puzzles, challenges and mini-games for a diverse experience.</li></ul><br/><strong>The Blind Prophet - Blood of the Apostle</strong> inherits from well-known point'n'Click games while trying to propose something fresh in substance and format.<br/><br/>If you like to play point'n'Click games the simple way, and want to experience an animated narrative story with contemplation and reflexion, you will enjoy this game.
